abstract.p: List of some current travel discount offers

block.p: B & B THE FRENCH WAY -- A six-night package in France offered by Country Cottages of Boca Raton, Fla., starts at $1,098 a person, double occupancy, through June 15, including bed-and-breakfast lodgings, round-trip trans-Atlantic air fare and a rental car. The package, called ''Go As You Please -- Decouvrir la France,'' offers a choice of 500 places to stay throughout the country; all have rooms with private bath. Travelers receive vouchers for their rooms and can reserve their first night before departure; the rest are booked as they go, with a free phone call from each night's lodging. (Alternatively, Country Cottages will make the reservations for $12 per location.) The price of $1,098 is also good from Sept. 16 through Oct. 31. From June 16 to Sept. 15 and Dec. 16 to 24, it is $1,296, dropping to $899 from November to mid-December and January through March. Flights are on British Airways via London. The car is a stick-shift economy model with unlimited mileage. Reservations: (800) 674-8883.

SAILING THE MEDITERRANEAN -- First European Cruises is offering savings averaging $1,000 a person on September and October voyages of the 1,200-passenger Mistral in the eastern Mediterranean. The ship, which entered service in July, sails round trip from Venice on Saturdays from June through October on seven-day cruises to Dubrovnik, Katakolon (for Olympia), Santorini, Mykonos, Rhodes and Piraeus (for Athens). The special rates start at $949 a person, for double occupancy in an inside cabin; from $1,110 for an outside cabin; the rate is $1,800 a person for a mini-suite with balcony. Round-trip flights to and from Venice are priced at $950 from the East Coast. The ship's management aims to carry a mix of Europeans and about 15 percent North Americans; the international dining-room staff and stewards are English speaking. There are two outdoor pools, a spa and thalassotherapy center. Information: (888) 983-8767 or www.first-european.com.

EL AL COMPANION FARES -- Through Dec. 31, passengers in first and business class flying round trip between the United States and Israel on El Al can buy a companion ticket in the same class for $250. From New York to Tel Aviv, the summer first-class fare is $7,754, business class $5,258. The companion tickets must be purchased directly from El Al. For more information: (212) 768-9200.

TOUR OF THAILAND -- Grand Circle Travel, geared to those 50 and over, has a Jewels of Thailand itinerary from October through early May 2001 that starts at $1,195 a person, double occupancy, including air fare from New York and 16 other cities, six nights' lodging in Bangkok and seven in Chiang Mai, and many meals. (The lowest price is for late April and early May, going up to $1,445 in October.) For more information: (800) 248-3737.
